title: What will 'normal' life be like after COVID-19 in 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: So, do you really believe that COVID-19 will expire in 2021? This thing could go away then, but it’s far more likely that 2023 is the end year. By then, we just might have both a working vaccine and herd immunity working. But 2021? I doubt it.

See the problem is, I can't answer that question because we don't know whether a cure for COVID will be found anytime soon, or whether it might be found at all. Maybe this is God cleansing the planet.
It won't be! The world will be a very screwed up place. Isolation, depression, and recession. So is the apocalypse upon us? Not really just Dystopian!
